title: Uplifting Only 2013 Top-Voted Tunes (Mixed By Ori Uplift) (320kb
description:
Uplifting Only 2013: Top-Voted Tunes (Mixed By Ori Uplift) (2013) 

                            Trance | Abora Recordings

              320 kbps | MP3 | unmixed | 2013 | 06:19:21 | 870 Mb


This mixcompilation contains 21 tunes (including 4 previously unreleased edits & 5 new remasters) that fans voted into the top 3 in the weekly voting for Ori Uplift's Uplifting Only radio podcast aired on DI.fm and iTunes. It also includes 3 continuous mixes, one for each of the following uses or purposes of the music: Exercise, Revitalize (uplifting & euphoric music), & Soothe (music that calms you down). In addition, it contains 3 additional tracks played on the show to complete the mixes, plus three chillout tracks, bringing the total number of tracks to 27. The Balearia track has never been released before. In total, the release includes music from 10 different labels. It includes the following new, previously unreleased edits of SoundLift & Nery, Playme, and Manuel Le Saux & ReOrder: Nery - Inesquecivel (SoundLift Intro Edit) Playme - Peace & Serenity (Original Edit) ReOrder & Manuel Le Saux - Haste (Short Edit) The remastered tracks are the following: NatLife feat. Arunima - Saawariya (New World Remaster) Araya & Mark Dreamer - Tension (New World Remaster) Emanuele Congeddu & Nicolas Marriott - First Kiss (Original Mix) Etasonic - No Words Can Tell This (Emanuele Congeddu's Emotional Touch) Ronny K vs Ziki - Memories (New World Remix) For timed tracklists for the three mixes, see the release booklet, or visit www.upliftingonly.com or the release page in the www.abora-recordings.com site.
